info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:24PM EDT until July 29 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL SCHENECTADY...SOUTHEASTERN FULTON...SOUTHERN SARATOGA AND EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 223 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Glenville, or near Amsterdam, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Clifton Park, Saratoga Springs, Amsterdam, Scotia, Mechanicville, Glenville, Niskayuna, Ballston Spa, Hagaman, Round Lake, Galway, Rotterdam Junction, East Glenville, Burnt Hills, Country Knolls, North Ballston Spa, Alplaus, Pattersonville-Rotterdam Junction and Halfmoon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
